title: Why do Gen Z have a growing appetite for retro tech?
description: Gen Z are going retro, with studies showing a resurgence in people buying tech in the modern age that can be dated back decades.
content:
Gen Z are going retro. People in their teens and early 20s are increasingly turning to old school tech in a bid to unplug from the online world.
Amazon UK told BBC Scotland News that retro-themed products surged in popularity during its Black Friday ... [3334 chars]

title: How solar storms that cause the Northern Lights have the power to wreak havoc on Earth
description: The aurora borealis can bring stunning night skies, but hidden dangers can accompany the Northern Lights to disrupt life on earth as Chris Fawkes explains.
content:
Witnessing a dazzling display of the Northern Lights with vivid sheets of colour dancing across the night sky is a real treat for those lucky enough to be in the right place at just the right time.

title: Sold 30 items on Vinted? Don't panic if you get a message about tax
description: Here's what you need to know about tax rules if you're selling items online.
content:
Jazz singer Billie van der Westhuizen started using Vinted about six months ago to sell clothes and shoes she hadn't worn for ages.

title: West Midlands police chief sorry for saying Jewish community supported Maccabi fan ban
description: Senior officer had told MPs some Jewish representatives did not want Maccabi Tel Aviv fans at Aston Villa game classified as high risk
content:
A senior police officer has apologised to Birmingham’s Jewish residents after he told MPs that some had expressed support for the exclusion of Maccabi Tel Aviv fans from attending last month’s match against Aston Villa.

title: US national parks drop free admission on MLK Day and Juneteenth, but add Trump's birthday
description: The Department of the Interior has released a list of what it calls "resident-only patriotic fee-free days" for next year.
content:
Americans will be able to visit national parks for free on Donald Trump's birthday next year, but will no longer be able to do so on Martin Luther King Jr Day or Juneteenth.
